conditions.short_description: Unstable wind slabs in the mountains in many parts of the country. Chances of wet avalanches on Friday in warm weather and rain.
conditions.full_description: Unstable wind slabs in the mountains in many parts of the country. Chances of wet avalanches on Friday in warm weather and rain.

area_forecast.forecast: Considerable snow is in the area after the snowfall on Tuesday. The wind increased on Wednesday so wind slabs have most likely formed, especially in gullies and SW-facing slopes.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Considerable snow is in the area after the snowfall on Tuesday. The wind increased on Wednesday with blowing snow, so wind slabs have likely formed in many places, especially in gullies and SW-facing slopes. The slabs are likely unstable at first. Rising temperature on Friday with some rain, which increases the risk of wet avlanches.
area_forecast.weather: Hæglætis veður á fimmtudag en á föstudag er vaxandi NA-átt með hlýnandi veðri og rigningu með köflum, mögulega snjókomu efst til fjalla. Útilt fyrir svipað veður á laugardag.

area_forecast.forecast: There is little snow in the mountains. Snowfall expected on Thursday in NW and later NE wind, making windslabs in SE-SW aspects. Rain and warmer weather on Friday and Saturday and snow likely melts.
area_forecast.snow_condition: There is little snow in the mountains. Snowfall expected on Thursday in NW and later NE wind, making windslabs in SE-SW aspects. Rain and warmer weather on Friday and Saturday and snow likely melts.
area_forecast.weather: NV-átt og éljagangur á fimmtudag og snýr svo í norðanátt um kvöldið og minnkandi él. NA-átt og stöku él á föstudag en hlýnar og rigning eða slydda á láglendi og snjókoma í hæstu fjöll á laugardag með stífri NA-átt.

area_forecast.forecast: Considerable snow in mountains and windslabs have accumulated in W- and S- aspcets, layering possible. New windslabs expected to form in NW wind on Thursday. Snow will become wet and unstable for a time, especially in lower elevations on Friday and Saturday.
area_forecast.recent_avalances: A small dry loose avalanche fell in Hrafnaskál in Ólafsfjörðru on Tuesday 28th Oktober.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Considerable snow is in the area, mostly it has snowed in northerly and northeast wind and have windslabs formed, especially in S- and W- aspects. More snow seems to have accumulated inland the by the coast last week. Some layering could be expected between windslabs. New windslabs form in SE aspects in NW wind and snowfall on Wednesday night/Thursday. Snow in lower elevations will become wet and could be unstable for a time as it rains in lower elevations on Friday and Saturday.
area_forecast.weather: N/NV átt og snjókoma eða él á fimmtudag en styttir svo upp um kvöldið. Á föstudag kemur lægð austur af landinu með hlýindum, hvassri norðaustanátt og snjókomu í til fjalla en rigningu á láglendi á föstudag og laugardag.

area_forecast.forecast: Isolated wind slabs have formed in the mountains, mainly in gullies and lows. Wet avalanches expected on Friday.
area_forecast.snow_condition: Wind slabs have formed in the mountains, mainly in gullies and lows. On top of them is a rather thin cover of powder snow and some new snow will be added on Thursday in rather light wind. Rising temperature on Friday with heavy precipitation, mainly as rain but possibly snow at high elevations. Wet sluffs are expected in this weather and possibly new wind slabs at high elevations.
area_forecast.weather: Fremur hægur vindur á fimmtudag og snjóar dálítið um kvöldið. Á föstudag hlýnar með mikilli úrkomu í austlægri átt. Líklega snjóar til fjalla fyrst um sinn. Dregur úr úrkomu um kvöldið og útlit fyrir rigningu með köflum á laugardag en áfram hlýtt.

weather_forecast.forecast: NE/E wind on Friday with rising temperature and rain, mostly in the southeast, east, north and Strandir. Snow or sleet at high elevations at first.
